author: cnbc.com
title: PRSM Votes ServiceChannel CEO to its Board of Directors
text:
Tom Buiocchi elected to help lead industry association; ServiceChannel also announces expansion milestones and advancements
NEW YORK & NASHVILLE, Tenn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- ServiceChannel , the leading SaaS service automation platform for facilities managers and contractors, today announced that the Professional Retail Store Maintenance Association (PRSM) has elected ServiceChannel CEO, Tom Buiocchi , to its Board of Directors. Tom was nominated by a committee of PRSM retail and service provider members, and joins representatives from Extra Space Storage, Gap, H&M, Luxottica, Nike, TD Bank, and Walmart, among others on the board.
This distinction coincides with a time of expansion and advancements at ServiceChannel, as the company recently expanded its footprint to the Bay Area with new offices in Pleasanton, CA. The company also announced an increase to its data science team, which empowers customers and service providers with the deep insights and analytics to help optimize their facilities and businesses.
“It’s an exciting time for the company, and the transformation we are seeing is a direct result of the dynamic nature of the industry combined with unprecedented technological advancements,” said Tom Buiocchi . “As the retail industry continues to re-invent itself, this is a critical time to contribute to the PRSM board. I’m honored to be able to do my part in helping to lead the industry toward the future.”
On the heels of an executive leadership expansion earlier this year , ServiceChannel also welcomes two new vice presidents. Carl Edwards brings over a decade of engineering experience from Pandora, and will focus on advanced development and features in the company’s new Pleasanton office, and Chris Aguas joins as the new head of payments, overseeing the delivery of payments solutions for customers and contractors.
Visit ServiceChannel at PRSM2018
Stop by booth #400 at the PRSM2018 National Conference on April 9-11 in Nashville, TN, to learn how ServiceChannel provides facilities managers with a single marketplace to source, procure, manage, and pay for repair and maintenance services from commercial contractors across the enterprise.
On Tuesday, April 10 at 7 p.m., join ServiceChannel at the Falls Bar & Lounge at Gaylord Opryland for a tapas-style menu, wines, hand-crafted cocktails, bottled beer and more. Register today and add the event to your calendar.
About ServiceChannel
ServiceChannel provides facilities managers with a single platform to source, procure, manage and pay for repair and maintenance services from commercial contractors across their enterprise. By delivering unprecedented transparency and data-driven analytics of service quality, across all trades, locations and contractors, facilities managers drive significant brand equity and ROI for their organizations without outsourcing or investing in new infrastructure. The world’s leading global brands use ServiceChannel solutions daily to help optimize millions of transactions and billions of dollars of spend annually. Learn more: servicechannel.info .
